1.content: Well, we have to start with the choices
1.title: Choices

11.content: We're getting closer now, pick a show
11.title: More choices

1111.content:
Yugi has managed to enter another dueling tournament...

"I attack with Dark Magican!"

Right at that moment, his opponent has 100 life points. However, strangely enough, his opponent plays a new card called Curse of the Giant. A light erupted from Yugi's Duel Disk that hit him directly, but nothing happened. Because of this, he thought nothing of it, continuted on dueling, and won.
Later that night, Yugi feels strange, but for some reason that night, he goes to bed in his clothes. When he woke up the next morning....
1111.title: There's a duel

11111.content:
That morning, when Yugi woke up, he found the house he was in completely destroyed. He was in his clothes, but something was odd. He looks down, and he says:

"I'm a giant! How did this happen?"
He thinks for 5 seconds before realizing that Curse of the Giant may have had some magical power.

"Hmm...what should I do?"
11111.title: Yugi is huge

choices: He runs into one of his friends
111112.content:
Yugi then decides

"Hey, I'm a giant, it's not like anyone can stop me."

He stands up and starts walking toward the city. With every step he took, the ground would shake. He started laughing, saying how fantastic this was. When he got to the city, he easily towered over most of the buildings. The townspeople stared in fear at Yugi's god-sized face. "Hey, I'm almost like a god to these people" He gets an evil smile on his face. When he stood next to a normal person, all they could see at eye level was the bottom half of his foot, easily at least 5 times bigger than they are. When they looked up, they could barely see past his legs. He knocked over a few buildings with his body and tortured a few people with the smell and pressure of his foot. He starts laughing as he picks up a person in his fist and crushes them, simply to see that he could.

And then....
111112.title: Yugi has some fun with the city

11122.content: How about Joey's sweet little sister Serenity?
11122.title: How about Serenity Wheeler?

1131.content: OK, 1 more choice. Is he still the nice guy he usually is or does he turn evil for some reason?
1131.title: Almost there

choices: He was bigger than the building itself
11312.content:
Jaden is at the Duel Academy, at about 9 in the morning, so he really doesn't want to be there. "*yawn* Can't I just up at noon?" he asked. Syrus answered him "Jaden, if it were up to you, there wouldn't be any classes." Dr. Crowler was teaching the class and he noticed this. "MR. YUKI, PAY ATTENTION, OR I'LL HAVE YOU EXPELLED" Jaden paid no attention to this and fell asleep, while Dr. Crowler was talking about an item that had unknown effects.
-------------------
That night, Jaden went to look at this thinking it probably did nothing. It was glowing green, and when he touched it, he quickly got an upset stomach. That night, he want to sleep wondering what this thing did.

When he woke up...
11312.title: At school learning

113122.content: Jaden wakes up as he realizes: "Hey, I'm a giant." As he thinks about what to do, he considers several options, Should he go off the island, or have fun with the people in the academy?
113122.title: What will he do?

choices: Have fun destroy the city, then get slaves
1131221.content:
"I'll deal with these guys later" he said as he walked out into the sea. The water came up to his hips when he went in. When he took a step, it created what would be a small splash to him, but a huge wave to everyone else, and he knew this. He turned around, and kicked the sea, facing the Duel Acadamy. The wave flooded the bottom half of the building. Laughing, Jaden turned around and headed toward the city, each step causing a giant wave and making the island shake.
--------------------------
Just as he got to the city, he decided to
1131221.title: Going to have fun

choices: He crushes them to set an example
11312212.content:
Jaden decides "I need slaves first, but then I'll destroy the city." He stops in the middle of the city and says "LISTEN UP, YOU ARE ALL MY SLAVES!" He picks up the screaming crowd in his colossal hand. "IF ANYONE DISOBEYS ME, THEY WILL BE PUNISHED." A man bravely says "What are you going to do, huh? Jaden smiles and picks the guy out in his other hand. Then, the guy starts screaming as Jaden starts sqeezing him.

Then....
11312212.title: Jaden gets slaves

113122121.content: Jaden decides to stop squeezing this guy and says "THAT'LL HAPPEN IF ANY OF YOU DISOBEY ME" However, the guy decided to risk speaking up when he says "HA, I knew you were too much of a coward to do anything." Hearing this, Jaden decided to....
113122121.title: Second chance

1131221212.content: Jaden replies "WHAT DID YOU JUST SAY?" This guy, thinking he must be king of the world or something at the time, replies "You heard me." Right at that moment, Jaden smiles again, and replies "It's a long way down" and drops the guy. He hits the ground, and when he does, Jaden steps on him. He then decides to...
1131221212.title: A long fall

1153.content: Do you want Sailor Moon?
1153.title: Sailor Moon?

11532.content: This has to be one of the musts. Cardcaptor Sakura. This anime has canon giantess sequences.
11532.title: Cardcaptor Sakura?

115321.content: Well, Sakura Kinomoto is the obvious choice.
115321.title: Sakura?

1153212.content: Well, Tomoyo Daidouji is a rather good choice in my opinion.
1153212.title: Tomoyo?

115322.content: Fruits Basket has a reputation for being America's favourite shoujo serial. Will you go for it?
115322.title: Fruits Basket?

12431.content:
You are Razdak, a level 5 wizard trying to rise through the ranks in your village. You have heard tell of various villages developing shrinking and/or growing spells to try to gain an edge in war. Perhaps this could be the perfect opportunity.

You have just woke up and it is a bright, sunny day in the village. You begin to get ready, wondering what adventures this day will hold. A villager appears at your window.

"Sir, the archer queen has summoned you"

"Thank you," you tell the villager and she goes away on her way. They never stick around for long.
12431.title: Clash of Clans

choices: "I don't think I can do that"
124311.content:
You tremble as you enter the town hall. The queen is generally pretty reasonable, and is quick to reward good work, but can get angry when she doesn't get what she wants. You walk hesitantly up to her chamber. The door is open. You look in and see her polishing her cross bow, not paying attention to you. You knock on the door and she looks up.

"Ah yes, I was expecting you Razdak." She stands up to her full height, easily twice your size, and you tremble harder as she approaches you, bare feet thudding on the stone floor. She stops right in front of you and you have to crane your neck upwards to meet her gaze.

"I have heard wizards in other villages are developing shrinking and growing spells. I could use one of these in the upcoming war. You're the smartest wizard we have. Do you think you could brew one of these for me?"

You blush with the compliment, but are unsure if you have the ability to do this.
124311.title: Go see the archer queen

1243111.content:
"Excellent! Better get going, we need it as soon as possible." She turns and starts to walk away, but then stops and turns her head. "Oh, and if you disappoint me, things won't go well for you, but I don't need to tell you that."

"Of course, your majesty."

With that, she goes back to polishing her crossbow, and you get out of there as quick as you can and make your way over to the laboratory. Now, you just need to decide which spell to make, and figure out how to make it.
1243111.title: "Yes, certainly"

choices: Take the spells straight to the queen
12431111.content:
Although a growing spell would be more impressive, you decide a shrinking spell would help the most in battle against other clans. You get to work You spend all day in the laboratory, gathering ingredients, pouring through spellbooks, stirring huge, bubbling cauldrons, singing your eybrows, etc. until finally, you think you've got it. When you walk out of the laboratory with your newly created spells, it's late in the evening.

You're anxious to bring them to the queen, but you can't think what might happen if they don't work.
12431111.title: Shrinking spell

choices: Go try to get on the Barbarian King's good side.
Go back to the laboratory and try to make a growing spell now
124311111.content:
You run all the way back to the town hall and the queen's chambers, then come to a dead stop when you reach the door. It is still open, but this time she is sitting in her throne string straight at it, and she doesn't look happy. The level 30 archer queen stands up to her full height.

"You! What took you so long? I said we needed these spells as soon as possible!"

"I'm sorry, your majesty..." you being to stammer, before she cuts you off.

"No excuses! You better hope these spells work. Well, did you make shrinking or growing spells?"

You are now shaking in your boots. "Shrinking spells, your majesty. I thought..."

"Let me see one." She walks over to you and takes one out of your hand, holds it up to her face, and examines it. You see a slight smile form on her previously angry face. She seems pleased, which puts you at ease.

"Very nice," she says, "have you tested them?"

"No, your majesty, I didn't have..."

"Well we can't use them before testing them, can we?"

With that, she unstoppers the bottle and pours the glowing blue potion over you before you have time to object. The spell starts working immediately. Your vision goes from her waist to her knees to her toes as you shrink. You look up to see her face smiling brightly down at you from far above.

"Well done. I didn't expect it to work that well," she says as she raises her foot. "This will definitely win the next war for us."

"Wait, what are you doing, your majesty?" you shout up as her giant bare foot hovers over you.

"I have to finish testing all the way through, just as though you were an enemy. Believe me, I don't enjoy this, but it's the duty of a queen."

You doubt that because you think you see her smile get wider as she slowly lowers her foot. You close your eyes and brace for impact as her giant, soft foot comes crashing down with a thud, flattening you to the ground. She leaves her foot there for a moment, then removes it and looks down at you, flattened to the floor, admiring her work.

As the effects of the spell wear off, you begin to get bigger, back to your normal size, and get unstuck from the floor, and unflattened.

You look shamefully over at the queen, who is still smirking. "Well done, Razdak. I'm promoting you to level 6 for this. Just remember, with a higher level comes higher responsibilities, and graver consequences if you fail at those responsibilities. Now, you may take your leave."

You run out of her chamber and out of the town hall. Your whole body is aching from being squashed. How could the queen be so cruel, after what you did for the village?
124311111.title: Take the spells straight to the queen

124311112.content: You decide to try it out first. Who will you try it out on?
124311112.title: Try it out first

choices: Take it straight to the Queen
12431112.content: You begin vigorously mixing elixirs and ingredients. After hours at the laboratory, you finally think you have it. Now what to do?
12431112.title: Growing spell

choices: Sit at the table to feast.
Go out on the dance floor.
124311121.content:
You rush back to the town hall and into the Queen's chamber to find her anxiously awaiting you.

"Well, what did you make?"

"A growing spell," you reply.

"Excellent. We'll take it into battle right away. Ready the troops."

You rush out of the town hall with the queen following close behind and begin rounding up troops of all kinds, giants, archer, barbarians, Valkyries. When you finally have a sizable army, you begin marching to the next village. As you approach the wall, the queen stands back with the king and sends the giants first, followed by the wizards, including you. The giants begin pounding on the walls, taking all the heat from the defenses, while you vigorously hurl fireballs at them. The wallbreakers further demolish the walls and you make your way in behind the giants, arrows and cannonballs falling all over. It's total chaos. You hear the sound of a spell drop behind you, but unfortunately, you are out of it's aura. You are too busy to turn around, but you wonder if it was one of your growing spells.

Up ahead, troops come rushing out of the clan castle. Your heart sinks as you see it is mostly bowlers. If you get hit by one of their giant rocks, you'll be smushed for sure and your fireballs won't help. You cower as one lumbers toward you, holding his giant rock up, about to hurl it down at your head, when all of a sudden, FOOM! A giant bare foot slams down, completely pounding the bowler into the ground, the force knocking you off your feet. You look way up to see the archer queen smiling down at you, "Looks like your spell worked. Stick close to me little man, I'll protect you."

You run along with the queen, under her cape, being careful to avoid her giant footfalls that are crushing the enemy troops left and right. She is powerful enough when she is her normal size. Now she is unstoppable. The enemy troops, bowlers, valks, and barbarians can do nothing but stare up in horror as she raises her giant foot to stomp them and grind them into the ground. Next to her you can see the barbarian king crushing the enemy buildings to rubble under his giant, sandaled feet. Before long their entire village is flattened. Then the spell wears off and the king and queen return to their normal size. The king hoists you up on his shoulders and the entire army cheers for you. Then you all return to your village with all the gold and elixir to have a party to celebrate the victory.

The party is held in the town hall, and they spared no expense. There is feasting, music, dancing, and entertainment.
124311121.title: Take it straight to the Queen

13.content: A cartoon you say? All right, how about one of these?
13.title: Make a choice

131.content: Who do you want to grow?
131.title: Who grows?

1311.content: Is he still good or evil for some reason?
1311.title: Almost

13112.content:
One day, Danny was flying around Amity Park. "Man, I've had such a bad day that I'm mad at everyone right now." He flies into the lab on top of his parents' house, when something catches his eye.
"Hey, a new invention."
He tries it, and it causes the lab and HIM to grow. When he stops growing, he finds himself 200 ft tall and the lab is proportianal to his size. "Awesome, I can change my form here, and if I bring someone, no one will know."

He decides to, as Danny Phantom....
13112.title: One morning...

choices: Be Danny Fenton's slave (yeah, he still doesn't know)
131121.content:
He starts to go in the city, which begins to shake. As he's walking, he sees Dash. He thinks to himself, "Hey, Dash would make a good slave." He flies down and scoops Dash up with no effort. He becomes invisible so no one can see him fly Dash back to the lab. When he gets there, he places Dash on the floor. Dash takes one look and only can see Danny's foot, about 7 times bigger than his body, and capable of crushing him in 1 step.

"WELL, DASH, YOU'RE GOING TO BE MY SLAVE!" Dash replies, "What if I don't want to?" Danny picks up his foot and places it over Dash, applying just a little bit of pressure.
Smiling, Danny asks "ARE YOU SURE YOU DON'T WANT TO BE MY SLAVE?" Dash is screaming from the pressure, but still manages to say that he changes his mind. Danny takes his foot off Dash, which lands on the floor with a thud.


"YOUR FIRST ORDER IS TO..."
131121.title: Getting a slave

13511.content: It was another day on summer vacation. As usual, Gwen had somehow managed to annoy Ben so he decided to play around with the Omnitrix. "What else can this thing do?" he wondered as he stepped outside. The Omnitrix shocked him, then he watched himelf grow to...
13511.title: What a shock

135112.content:
Ben looked down, and knew he was huge, but he didn't know how huge. He started laughing and had a plan. "Now to torture Gwen" he said. He started walking until he found her. She looked across and could only see his foot. Ben said "Ha, you look as small as Gray Matter. He started laughing and chasing her. Every step he took caused the ground to shake. Eventually, one of the earthquakes knocked Gwen over. She said "What are you going to do you little dweeb?" Ben replied "You'll see."

He decided to....
135112.title: Ben is huge

1351121.content: Ben thought to himself "My butt should be a good enough punishment for her. It'll at least break her bones." He started laughing as his building sized butt and those green pants started approaching Gwen. She stuck her arms out to try to stop him, but that ended up breaking her arms. As Ben completely sat on her, he....
1351121.title: Stitting on Gwen

info.brief_description: Watch anime, videogame characters, cartoons, etc. grow...GT and GTS allowed, mix preferred
info.description:
This is a story in which anime, videogame characters, or cartoon characters grow..a few guidelines

No hard v o r e
GT/GTS Allowed, but I prefer a mix (not all of 1 or the other, ie. Having 25 GTS and 3 GT is against this, to clarify, and vice versa)
Minimal toilet stuff
No gay
OOC is allowed, who says they'll act the same way if they grow
Don't go as far as sex, at least not at the time
Have fun!
